comment.author: 46696233@N00
comment._content: According to this: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9500E6D61F3FEF33A... It was built in 1873 and was used as a training ship for years after it was no longer battle ready. More percisley, acoording to navalhistory.flixco.info/H/311442/8330/a0.htm Building began in 1871, was completed in 1873 and was decomissioned (and either scrapped, sold or tranferred) on Jan 01 1905

comment._content: I started a Wikipedia entry for the ship: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frundsberg_(ship)
